metadata.description: Agent AI skill sets — Knowledge (Design Patterns, Refactoring, SOLID), Workflows (Ticket Lifecycle, PR Writing, Report Generation), and Frameworks (Symfony)

plugins.name: design-patterns-virtuoso
plugins.description: 26 design pattern skills — creational, structural, and behavioral patterns with PHP 8.3+ examples

plugins.name: refactoring-virtuoso
plugins.description: 89 refactoring skills — techniques, code smells, and dealing with generalization, all with PHP 8.3+ examples

plugins.name: solid-virtuoso
plugins.description: SOLID principles for object-oriented design — SRP, OCP, LSP, ISP, DIP with multi-language examples (PHP, Java, Python, TypeScript, C++)

plugins.name: ticket-workflow
plugins.description: End-to-end ticket workflow — from ticket analysis through investigation, planning, TDD implementation, committing, and PR creation. Adapts to your environment via a supplement file created on first run.

plugins.name: pr-message-writer
plugins.description: Write comprehensive pull request messages with structured technical documentation, testing instructions, and verification queries. Framework-agnostic with customizable templates.

plugins.name: report-generator
plugins.description: Generate a polished standalone HTML report summarizing changes, findings, debug investigations, or architectural decisions. Opens automatically in the browser.

plugins.name: agentic-rules-writer
plugins.description: Generate a rules file for any AI coding agent. Interactive setup that scans installed skills, asks about workflow preferences, and writes a tailored instruction file for Claude Code, Cursor, Windsurf, Copilot, Gemini, Roo Code, or Amp. Supports global, project team-shared, and project dev-specific scopes.

plugins.name: symfony-virtuoso
plugins.description: All 38 Symfony component skills — APIs, code patterns, configuration, and common use cases for PHP 8.3+ and Symfony 7.x
